Opower GYM Rules

  • Respect all members and staff.
  • Use equipment properly and return it after use.
  • Maintain cleanliness in all areas.
  • Do not adjust sound systems, TV, or AC settings.
  • No food or drinks near workout areas.
  • Wear appropriate gym attire at all times.
  • Follow all instructions given by trainers.
  • Mobile phones should be on silent mode.
  • Report any injuries immediately to the staff.
